review_text: Very good stay, quick check in

A great place to stay on my way to Minneapolis St. Paul. The house was really clean and adorable. Maura even had some fun little K cups available for her guests to use in her Keurig, which I really appreciated because I forgot to get some at the store on my way up. The house was decorated with a find Bohemian style. You could tell that Maura put a lot of effort into the details of her living room and kitchen; the communal areas of this home There were some great restaurants near nearby on the main street in downtown Janesville. I had a wonderful salmon salad at the Whiskey Bar and Grill. Also, the neighborhood had an old-fashioned little Americana feel and I felt extremely safe. In fact, I’m staying there again on my way back home tomorrow evening. Thank you so much for your hospitality Maura!
Very comfortable and clean apartment! Highly recommend.

The house was very comfortable and a homey place to stay for a week. It is well-set up for people traveling alone or with one other person. The kitchen was well-equipped and I appreciated being able to cook breakfast. The only missing item was a cutting board, which is not essential. The living room was cosy, a bit small if we had been a group of four, however great for one person working on a laptop. I really appreciated being able to park in the driveway for peace of mind about the rental car! It was great to know that Maura and her husband were available and responsive throughout my stay. Overall, they have provided a comfortable and very functional place to stay durya visit to Janesville.

Inexpensive space with a large backyard for the dogs. There is only one bathroom for four rooms, so that could mean up to 8 adults sharing one bathroom. The shared kitchen was sufficient for minimal meals and food storage in the refrigerator/freezer. Maura was very communicative.
Very Nice. Would come back if I needed to.
Cute little place and nice fenced in yard for the dogs
Maura was amazing! Check in was very easy and the instructions were clear. I left my glasses and Maura was kind enough to send them to me! Would stay here again :)
Nice place.
Maura’s place was fantastic, easy and flexible check in all for a great price.

The house as elegantly decorated. The host provided soap and shampoo for the bathroom, and allowed me to use the garage where I staged my luggage for my next stage of travel. The people staying there, on the other had were very stand offish and it was like having the house to myself. I am used to a more socially friendly place (not Maura's fault)
Easy to find and cozy.
Very clean accommodations, comfy bed, quiet neighborhood.

This place was nice; comfy after a snow storm around Janesville. The place was warm, the paths shoveled and a place for leaving shoes. My 2 pugs enjoyed the area even though the snow was too high for them 😃. But they were able to find spots to go. 💩 And having a poop bags available was very nice as I had forgot mine. Having a kitchen available was very nice. I will stay again when in the area.
I stayed for 8 weeks. Very nice clean place to stay. Host was always responsive. If I ever go back to Janesville I would definitely stay with them again.
Super warm, cozy, and a perfect place to sleep after a night out. Nice quiet area super close to the main streets where there is more to do and see.
Nice place to stay for a couple days to a week. Nice bathroom, good workspace in bedroom, and really comfy bed!

This was the first time I have had other guests staying at the same location, but all other guests were friendly and helped when needed. The location of Maura's house was in a great location, I had access to all my events within 10 mins from location. I would stay again if ever in the area.

I stayed here 1 night as a stop over on our 2 day road trip. It was so nice to have an area to let my dog out and there was another guest with a dog so they got to play a little which helped. The house is super clean, which is impressive considering how many people must stay there on a weekly basis and most of the house is shared.
Maura was very helpful and the house was great!
Stayed for a month and was very happy with the quiet neighborhood, the fenced in yard for the dog, and the friendly and timely response from Maura. Definitely would stay again!
Such a quiet neighborhood and close to everything we needed. House was very clean and well stocked. Would definitely stay again!
The house was perfect for my family. It was immaculate and very comfortable. They were very accommodating and stocked the home with an array of supplies and essentials. We are so grateful!
Great place to stay for the weekend! Plenty of space and nice touches. Will be staying again!

This place was super amazing. The host was an absolutely outstanding. Was flexible with my checkout , responded very fast for last minute plans and also gave me a discount for my military service. I the house was clean and unique. Would definitely book here again next time I come to visit.
Newly renovated and Spotless.
Nice place!

This home is in a great location, very convenient for the town. It was in pristine condition and very well decorated. The cleanest airbnb I’ve stayed in to date. It’s perfect for a weekend landing spot or a professional staying in the area for business. The hosts were very helpful prior to my stay and had everything ready for my arrival. Thank you!
Great place with lots of land and bedrooms!
Absolutely gorgeous home and perfect for a large family. Very gracious hosts. Hoping to stay again the next time we visit.
Thank you very much for everything, definitely recommend this home and will definitely be back!
Great place to stay with a large group! 15 min drive to Janesville with groceries and food options.

We had a great stay at the farmhouse. It fit our needs for a business/social retreat with a great kitchen, dining table and places for conversation. The sleeping accommodations were also very nice. Host was very responsive and pleasant. Beautiful location in rural Wisconsin.
Very private and the house was really clean
the large dining room was the perfect size for our large family. we are very happy that we found this place.
Beautiful home! Booked for the holidays with family. Was very spacious and peaceful! They decorated the home and everything!
Thank you
We loved it! It was very clean and quite. Beautiful location!

Lovely 1880's farm house has been updated cosmetically and provides comfort and space for a large group. Good communication, check in was easy and flexible due to no booking immediately before or after, ample parking, well stocked kitchen including a nice welcome basket, awesome large dining table with coffee bar area, comfortable beds in bedrooms with ceiling fans.
Biggest negatives: No bathroom on the second floor where 4 of the 5 bedrooms are. Downsides: The towels in the bathrooms are somewhat small (although an abundance of wash cloths were provided) No side tables for some of the beds, no table lamps, and limited outlets for plugging in. The road the house sits on is actually fairly busy and surprisingly noisy even late at night.
One complaint: removing my own bedding and taking out trash when I'm being charged a hefty cleaning fee. (Other places do not require this)
But, it's a beautiful home, in a lovely setting, great for large groups convenient to several towns in the area

We absolutely loved our stay!!!
It was worth what we paid and absolutely BEAUTIFUL!
We stayed for a wedding in Janesville and met our needs in so many ways- the amount of rooms (to fit 8 people), and space it was perfect.
Very nice, clean and very accommodating.

Very rare that I stay somewhere that is better then I thought it would be. This is such a place.
1. Extremely clean and updated
2. Lot of amenities: Firepit, cornhole, etc
3. Communicative and kind hosts. Internet wasnt working. and within a few minutes of telling them, they came and fixed it. Also great suggestions on things to do prior to our arrival
The only con would be only 2 bathrooms, but this is something that is stated very clearly from the beginning and so can plan for the two bathrooms.

This was the perfect stay for a quick family vacation not too far from home! We enjoyed the large dining table, the out door space, used the grill, and the rooms fit everyone just great. The two restrooms there came
in handy with so many of us. It was a pleasant time and can’t wait to be back! Thanks for hosting us!

This house was amazing for our crew! We were a large group coming from all over to relax and vacation together. The kids had plenty of space for playing and many games of sardines were had. The fire pit was well stocked & the walking field was well maintained so we could stretch our legs. It was the first time we didn’t have to eat in shifts when all together, as we all fit around the dining room table. We were comfortable in our rooms & the insulation was so great that the littles could go to bed early and the big kids could stay up later and play without worry of waking them up. The house itself is beautifully renovated, with amazing old details sprinkled around (ie: the doorknobs!). It was so clean and comfortable! We want to make this a yearly get away!
Wonderful place for a family reunion. Beautiful setting with outdoor seating and historical architecture! We loved it.
The house and land is better than the pictures! Everything was perfect for a larger gathering!

This is one of the most beautiful, peaceful places we have rented anywhere in the states! The home is lovely well cared for and spacious. The hosts had a very thoughtful book of things to do and places to eat nearby; we grew up in the area yet discovered new adventures. We made s’mores by the campfire, took walks and watch the fire flies over the field. In the evenings… it was truly magical.
The home was just right for my large family. We felt right at home and would definitely use this property again.

Our group really enjoyed staying at the farm house. It was cute and was exactly as pictured. The towels and sheets were very clean, and so were the bathrooms and kitchen. We enjoyed the spacious land and privacy. The welcome book had some good restaurant recommendations that we tried and enjoyed. We hope to be back one day!

Nice and quiet place for a weekend getaway. Convenient location with all shops available within 10 miles radius. Had basic kitchen utensils for cooking. Lawn was tidy for the kids to play in barefoot. Had basic board games to keep ourselves busy. Would strongly recommend to my friends.
Beautiful, peaceful and nostalgic. Quiet and restful! Very responsive hosts and clearly proud owners of a historic site with remodeled kitchen and plenary of room for big family or group.
Great place. My grabdkids had a great time playing in the yard and exploring the land

I love being in the country so that made it wonderful! The place was super clean, calm, quiet, and very lovely. My son just died and my other children are scattered all around the country, so this was the perfect meeting place. It was nice having my family all be able to stay in this beautiful home without being crowded. The house has so much room, and the huge table in the dining room was just the best. Lots of talking happening around the big table was comforting for everyone. The kitchen was also well stocked and we could cook rather than go to restaurants. From check in till checkout everything went perfectly. This is not a house, it is a home filled with love. We were able to create some new memories to cherish. I’m hoping to be able to come back in a couple of years and have a nice family reunion. I think any family would love this place, and should try it! Highly recommend for peace and quiet when you don’t want the hassles of running from room to room at some random hotel!

We LOVED this house, it had so much character and charm. We had 16 people and it was a huge space where we never felt crowded or cramped. Absolutely beautiful, hosts were responsive and let us check out late. Also didn’t have to worry about noise with the huge property. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

This property exceeded all our expectations. The home was spacious and clean, allowing all of us to comfortably reunite and catch up on life. The bedrooms and bathrooms were well equipped with plenty of linens and towels, which added to the overall comfortable and relaxing experience. The location was tranquil, and it was a perfect getaway. The house was very accommodating for our large group allowing us to make memories together. The communication with the host was great as well, they were always available to answer any questions we had. I highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone looking for a comfortable, tranquil, and enjoyable stay, especially for large groups looking to catch up and reunite.

The site is as pictured and described; it was very comfortable for our family reunion. We were 7 adults sharing the house, and it worked very well for us. The bedrooms were large and comfortable, the kitchen was more than adequate for preparing full meals, and the house was tastefully decorated for the holidays. Great dining room with farmhouse table and benches, and nice coffee bar.
The farm is about 15-20 minutes from Janesville, on good roads. Easy to locate, but load up w/ supplies needed before you come.
Wonderful AIRBNB. Beautiful house and property. It was perfect for our large family gathering.
Beautiful stay, would definitely recommend and return.
The house was perfect. Very clean and welcoming. We had all of the comforts for our stay. We will go back when we visit our family again. So much room too!
Great home, clean updated and well kept
We found Jim's place to be a perfect accommodation for our visit. Clean, cozy, quiet and relaxing. Will definitely look to stay again when we are un the area.

I can't say enough to describe how amazing this little place was! It honestly had everything you would ever need, especially for long stays, and it was very cozy. My mom and I only stayed a weekend, but would love to come back for a longer visit. This definitely will become our goto stay when visiting family in Janesville! Thank you so much for sharing this lovely home 😊

We had such a comfortable stay at Jim’s place! It was much better than we expected, actually. They had everything you would need in the kitchen for cooking and even had plenty of snacks and water which was a wonderful touch. The area was very clean and the linens smelled great. The host was quick to respond with any questions we had. We would definitely stay here again next time we visit the area!

My family and I had a wonderful stay here. We are return visitors and will be back next time we are in Janesville. This is the ideal Airbnb for anyone looking for a quiet and comfortable place to stay during your trip. Couldn’t recommend it more!

Staying at Jim's place was great. Everything was as described, and matched the pictures (or was better in person!) We walked to several restaurants and enjoyed the area, as well as our being able to come back to our quiet, clean, and homey stay.
Jim was a great host!
This was a lovely one bedroom two bed apartment. Very close to downtown and had off street parking. Was exactly how it was advertised and allowed us to have a great visit in Janesville.

This was our fifth time staying at Jim’s. It’s always comfortable, cozy, and clean. The kitchen is well stocked if you plan to cook. The new TV in the bedroom and new air fryer were great additions since the last time we were there. It’s also walking distance to a small Mexican Restaurant and Grocery store.

Among my favorite Airbnb places! Perfect size for one or a few guests. Nicely furnished, including a decent set of cutlery! Jim & Marilyn left some snacks and bottled water which were appreciated after a cross country drive. Quiet, respectful neighbors in a nice middle class working neighborhood - more like "small town" feel rather than suburbia. Great internet connectivity. I'd stay at Jim & Marilyn's place again!
Beautiful place. Pictures are very accurate! Clean and convenient, great communication.
Highly recommend this rental. Great location-could walk to downtown restaurants. Place is charming and well kept.
Very nice place! Loved how he had coffee and a sweet treat in the fridge. Will probably be booking again soon!
Great stay for the price
Clean, cozy, and comfortable, Exactly what we were looking for. We felt right at home and had a great weekend in Janesville!

Excellent location and so well appointed! Very spacious and very cozy. Jim & his wife were so friendly and helpful, ensured I got in alright. The kitchen has the basics (like actually has them so you don’t have to buy oil/butter/spices if you opt to cook) and then some. Very walkable to downtown Janesville but set a couple min away from the middle of everything so it feels cozy & quiet at night.

LOVED!! An absolutely perfect stay and the photos don’t do the apartment justice. Super nice and responsive hosts, Jim greeted me in person with a delicious pumpkin roll in hand that paired wonderfully with hazelnut coffee - what a warm welcome! There are two beds with excellent separation for two individuals traveling together, the bed was super comfortable, as was the furniture in the living room. There’s a cozy fireplace that I didn’t use, but everything is so inviting that I didn’t want to leave. I really appreciated the ceiling fans as well as portable tower fans that will oscillate. The lights on dimmers were much appreciated, too! So many thoughtful touches. This has been my hand-down favorite stay. I was in town to meet with an attorney and found this location to be super convenient to the downtown and courthouse area, easily walkable and friendly neighborhood that felt exceptionally safe. It was nice to be able to use the driveway, especially for unloading and loading luggage.

This place is perfect. Loved all the little touches including instructions for light switches and TV, snacks, and the cinnamon rolls. It’s clear the host takes a lot of pride in this place and enjoys hosting. Bed was comfortable and place was clean and quiet. Loved the decor in kitchen and living room and the elector fireplace made it really cozy. Can’t wait to stay here again!
Jim's is a great place to stay while visiting Janesville. It had everything we needed and the location was perfect to walk downtown. We would love to stay again next time we visit.
Great spot. Walked to downtown, lots of restaurants, bars, etc. quiet and peaceful backyard. Two clean and comfortable beds. Full well stocked kitchen. Great value.

We love staying at this apartment. This was our third visit. We actually booked our next stay before I even got around to writing this review for our previous stay, so we'll be back soon! The apartment is very comfortable, well stocked, and a home away from home. I ended up having a terrible migraine the night we arrived. I appreciated so much the comfortable couch where I could just rest and watch t.v. The apartment is walking distance to the Lions Food Mart, as well as a Mexican grocery store/restaurant. The grocery store/restaurant has basics and we were able to get eggs, cheese for quesadillas, and a lemon for some homemade guacomole. I always cook when we are there and the apartment is well stocked with a blender, crockpot, cooking utensils, etc.

This was my first Airbnb experience, and the bar has been set very high.
They thought of pretty much everything. I arrived later than intended and not only did Jim take my phone call to help me find the location, he stayed on the phone to be sure my code worked on the door and I could enter.
The water bottles in the fridge and snacks available were a wonderful addition (especially after a long day of flights). They had an entire folder of local restaurants and things to do in addition to puzzles and some games in the house. Instructions were clear for everything and we had a wonderful stay.
When we come back to visit family again we will definitely plan on staying here. We had a great time and it was everything we could need and more.

I’m a Superhost myself and I have to say, Jims place is amazing. The bed was comfortable and had everything we needed. We surprised my daughter who just moved here for a job and turned 21 years old. Was not to bad of a drive into Madison and we enjoyed ourselves exploring. Came back to the Airbnb cooked dinner enjoying the outdoor patio space play a trivia game they had. We definitely will stay here anytime we visit.
This is the fourth time we have booked here, so, obviously, we love it. It is our go-to place when we visit family in Wisconsin. Thanks for everything!

I would definitely stay here again! Jim was very responsive to any questions we had and very accommodating! Place was exceptionally clean and comfortable...almost wished we could have stayed longer. Definitely see why he is a superhost. Overall an excellent experience.

Overall, we had a good experience at Jim’s place! It was nice being able to get just about anywhere in town in ~10 minutes. We had trouble with the code to get in initially, but the issue was resolved within 30 minutes or so. Unfortunately, the wifi was in and out our whole stay, but Jim was responsive about it. While we didn’t pursue getting the issue resolved (we weren’t at the house much, so it just didn’t feel worth it to worry about), Jim offered to come over to take a look, and we feel confident he would’ve gotten it resolved. He actually refunded us part of our fee for the trouble… so kind! The hosts left muffins on the island for us, which was so thoughtful (and awesome particularly for our 5 year old… she was excited)! And we really appreciated the cold waters in the fridge after a 20+ hour trip. I think it’s important to note the home is older (i.e. no central A/C, uneven floors, smaller spaces, etc) - so as long as that’s your vibe, you should have a great stay!

We had such an enjoyable stay! The house was so cozy and private. We loved using the kitchen and how easy to use everything was. There were so many thoughtful touches that made us feel right at home. We wish we would have booked a longer stay! The location was so convenient and close to all we needed to get to. Thanks for such a wonderful time!
The house was just as described. It was very clean and well stocked with towels, bed sheets etc. The location was quiet and peaceful.

This is the 3rd time we have stayed here while visiting family in town. Always love to see the continued updates but we felt the change to bi-fold doors on the bathroom lead to much less privacy. We will definitely be back when in town.

Jim and Marilyn’s place was wonderful. They went above and beyond to provide thoughtful touches and had everything necessary for a very comfortable “home away from home”. When I updated my reservation to add my friend who decided to join me, Jim messaged and offered to convert the futon into a bed without me even asking - I was really impressed with his care and attention to this small detail that I didn’t assume he’d think to take care of on our behalf. This level of care is obvious as you peruse the unit - outlets next to every bedside for easy charging, lots of snacks and drinks available for you to take, kitchen full of tools and spices for your cooking convenience! The beds were comfy and the linens spotless, along with everything else extremely well kept. I would stay here again in a heartbeat and you should, too!!!!
Loved our time! So cozy!

Jim’s place was well-kept and clean and very comfortable. Stayed two nights in mid-February after a decent snowfall, so the off-street parking was nice and in a quiet neighborhood. Check-in was easy with clear instructions. The additional refreshments were a nice touch. A nice breakfast restaurant was a short walk away (about 5-minute walk) and other bars and restaurants downtown were about a 10-minute walk away. Overall, the stay was pleasant and convenient and Jim’s place is highly recommended, particularly if you want easy access to downtown Janesville.

Jim’s house is everything I could have asked for. It is very cozy and comfortable, and it had everything my toddler daughter and I needed. Jim is very responsible and provided everything I needed for a smooth check in. I highly recommend it and plan to stay there when we come back to the region.

We love staying in this apartment! It was our second stay and was very comfortable and cozy. We even had a few Trick-or-Treaters on Halloween! We did most of our own cooking and enjoyed having the spacious kitchen. The living room is also very comfortable for watching movies. There is a small Mexican restaurant and grocery store around the corner. Though small, we were able to get some basic items like eggs and bacon. We took several walks and the neighborhood is very family friendly and walkable.
Jim’s place is great. Much more spacious than anticipated. Good location. Check in was so easy. Jim was great to communicate with. Would definitely stay again.
Jim was super helpful and quick with communication. I booked very last minute without any issues. Will definitely book again if we need another place to stay
Great place, within walking distance of some great restaurants, would recommend if you’re looking for a nice calm stay somewhere. The neighborhood was really quiet for pretty much all of my stay

Cozy stay. The hosts provided snacks and water and communicated very clearly. I was here in the summer and really appreciated the small backyard area. It is thoughtfully landscaped and serene. Walkable to downtown where there are coffee shops, food, and bars.
Perfect!!
Cozy apartment with everything you could need right near downtown.

The apartment is spacious, extremely well equipped, and in a quiet neighborhood that is easily walkable to downtown and restaurants. The shower is great, the furniture is comfortable and the hosts are generous and responsive. I had an excellent stay.
Such a great place to stay at! Went above and beyond our expectations. Definitely will stay again coming into town!

Jim's Airbnb was the perfect location for our adventure in Janesville. The neighborhood is quiet with lovely landscaping and a back patio to enjoy on a nice day. We found the place to be comfortable and cozy. The kitchen was equipped with all the basics and more including some fun snacks! We loved exploring downtown Janesville which was only a 10 min walk away. The ice age trail and bike trails are very close. We biked the Peace trail to Beloit/back and the Glacial river trail to Fort Atkinson and back. We also hiked the Ice age trail. Jim's communication was always helpful and prompt. I notice the little extras that aren't necessary with an airbnb but convenient. I appreciated the plug ins/USB outlets next to the bed on both sides, the easy keypad entry, the coffee options, the water/snacks/games provided, accessible shower and great water pressure, the fresh flowers, and the restaurants/brewery suggestions. We feel like we made friends in Janesville and look forward to coming back!! Thank you Jim and Marilyn!!
Jim is a great host. We have stayed there twice and we will staying there again when we come up to Janesville.

Jim And Marilyn are great hosts with a wonderful and cozy property. Their property is very clean and has a comfortable and homey feel. They also left complimentary snacks as a welcome. I spent a few days in Janesville and felt right at home at Jim and Marilyn’s property. Highly recommend!
It was such a cozy place to stay, really appreciated Jim's hospitality!
This was the perfect place for our weekend away! Excellent communication, very clean and quaint, and all extra touches showed the owners care very much. The bed was very comfortable too!
Cute, clean, great location, has everything you could ask for, great value!
Absolutely amazing! Great location, everything that I needed and then some was all accommodated. He even left some snacks. I highly recommend Jim’s place to all travelers.

Extremely pleased with my stay, thank you for everything Jim. Plenty of food and grocery options on Milton Av and surroundings nearby. I felt safe in the quiet neighbourhood, comfortable in the house, spent 4 weeks there and would definitely stay there again. A+
We have obviously enjoyed staying at Jim's place as we've stayed 4 times in the past 2.5 months!
It was bitterly cold and snowy during our stay and the apartment was cozy and comfortable, not drafty at all! Jim made sure the snow was cleared in advance and it was perfectly cleared!
Jim is a super gracious host! And once again the apartment was comfortable and homey. :-)

Staying here was so comfortable and well-appointed. The little alcove with a desk and futon made a perfect second sleeping space. And if you go over the Christmas season, there was even a decorated tree!

Wonderful place to stay if you’re looking to visit and see downtown Janesville! It’s very clean and everything is perfectly accommodated! Jim makes sure to take care of his guests with snacks, and many other things to make your stay enjoyable.

Jim's place was perfect for 3 friends to have a quiet catch up. It is located well with a lot of things to do close by. Jim's place was very clean and actually a little bigger than we expected. He communicated well and the stay was frictionless. Also, Jim included some unexpected treats that topped things off nicely.

This apartment is located on a quiet, but neighborly street. I arrived on Halloween and found joy in hearing all the trick or treaters enjoying the holiday. Everything I needed was within walking distance, and I hardly needed to use my car. The apartment is so cozy and comfortable i didn't want to leave.
Jim is a wonderful host. Prompt response to all of our questions. The accommodations were perfect for us. Having a fully furnished and fully equipped apartment made our stay so very nice.

Excellent apartment! We enjoyed the neighborhood atmosphere and even took some walks while we were there. Walking distance to The Cozy Inn and Citrus Cafe which were some great restaurants we tried. The apartment was clean and had great attention to detail! Jim even brought over a brand new pizza pan after we asked if there was one in the kitchen. We will definitely be back!
I don’t think it’s possible to find a better place to stay in Janesville for the value. Great location, exceptionally clean, has everything we needed. Highly recommend it!
Convenient, comfortable property! A gem find in Janesville.
We had a fantastic time! Location was very central and the apartment was very charming. We were provided extra amenities (food and drinks) which we were very appreciative for!
Cozy, clean, comfortable home in a great neighborhood! We enjoyed the little extras like the snacks/treats the hosts provided.
Great place! Clean, with all the amenities one could need. Easy check in, an AC in the living room and bedroom, even some snacks and drinks provided. Awesome space with an awesome host!
This is a full-size one bedroom apartment. Great place. Very modern, attractive, and organized. And super convenient. Truly a home away from home.

This really is a cozy apartment. The hosts provided great snacks and were responsive to all of our requests. Good access to Ice Age Trail, peace trail, and these trails led to other biking trails. Located in a safe quiet neighborhood.

Great value, great location in Southern WI, just 35 minutes from Madison.
Everything we needed, highly recommend!

We really enjoyed our stay at Jim’s place! It was quaint and cute. The bed was super comfy and it was a really cozy and quiet place to relax. Everything was clean and there were a lot of extras as far as snacks and sufficient supplies for our 2 night getaway. We would love to be back to visit in the future!
Cozy comfortable home. Clean and simple and Jim had great communication. We had no issues for our stay and would recommend this home to anyone looking for a quiet cozy place to go.
Great value, great location! Beautiful small yard to relax in. This was a really fun stay for us.
Jim is a great host. All the information is right, nice location, clean and comfortable. He responds quickly and was helpful. Highly recommend

This place is the absolute best: walking distance to downtown Janesville and in a historic neighborhood. Great Mexican place (La Fiesta Mexicana) and breakfast place (Citrus Cafe) within 5 mins walking. Super clean, all the amenities you could need, plus tons of added touches. Simply the best, rent it!

This was a great place to stay! Nice, quiet neighborhood. Very homey and comfortable! Jim puts in the extra effort with fresh snacks and beverages for the stay also. I would definitely recommend for a nice getaway! The location was close to downtown also. Great stores and restaurants in the area.

Absolutely lovely. Cozy, sparkling clean and in a quiet and historic neighborhood. We slept great, were very comfortable, and we loved how bright and airy this little apartment is
We'll be back!

Exactly the comfortable oasis I needed while staying a week on a travel assignment! Not a single complaint , Jim was very attentive to anything I might need , however there wasn’t a thing I could think of that wasn’t already provided. Check in and out was so easy, would definitely stay here again !!
I'm glad I stayed. It was very comfortable, clean, artistically staged, and had generous snacks.
Nice apartment with Snacks provided!
Excellent place, excellent location, and Jim stocked the place with snacks and beverages! Overall great place to stay.

This place is a FIND!! Stylish, warm, sparkling clean, Uber convenient everything—Jim was super communicative whenever I asked anything. I absolutely will triple recommend this adorable stay in Janesville! We will certainly be back!
Great place!

It was the perfect place for a couple. Incredible value. Roses were left on the kitchen table. Everything was clean. Great snacks. Plenty of privacy. A lovely little porch out back, which was a perfect place to relax. Would highly recommend
Jim has a great place to stay.
This cozy, welcoming apartment was the perfect space to get away and relax. This was my boyfriend and I’s first vacation together and I think we can both say it was a trip we will never forget.
Beautiful home, easy check in and great location

Loved the home and the area. Quite the neighborly neighborhood. Jim was awesome and always prompt with responses to messages. The only thing that could have made the stay better would have been a washer and dryer.

This place was very clean, and cozy. Jim was super fast on response to any questions I had, and the snacks he supplied was quite nice. This place made my stay in Janesville relaxing and nice, if I ever head back up this way I’ll be looking forward to booking this place again.

Easily one of the best Airbnbs I have stayed at in the USA, and comparable to the high standard of Airbnbs in Europe. Jim and Marilyn’s place is super clean, chic, and so well situated to access Janesville’s charming revitalized riverfront. Neighbors are friendly and quiet. You will absolutely love your time here, and the hosts are very responsive and willing to provide whatever you need.

Jim is a very thoughtful host. The home is very clean and had all of the amenities needed for your stay. The home is easy to find and has friendly neighbors. I will definitely stay here whenever I visit Janesville!
Perfect place, perfect hospitality and response, perfect stay.

This place is absolutely outstanding! Some of the most hospitable people I’ve ever come across. They’re do everything in their power to make sure you’re comfortable!! I highly recommend staying here super comfy beds with incredible views.

We really felt like we were on a luxurious cute boat! So many cute features of this cabin. The all-star is that deck on the second floor, with a nice grove of woods on one side and the stunning lake on the other. Very peaceful and comfortable for 2 or 3 people!
Great stay! Have already recommended it to some friends!

This place is amazing. You will not want to leave. I loved the room with the beds so much. It connects directly to the deck or "overlook" that floats above the relaxing wooded scenery with a splendid view of the lake.
Beautiful space - perfect city getaway. Cabin is very clean, the host is super responsive, and overall our stay was a lovely experience. Would reccomend to anyone

The home is very clean and would be excellent for a couple or small family looking for a relaxed and quiet weekend away. If you are hoping for wide open spaces and nature adventures with your children, then please be aware that this property does not offer a large play space or direct access to the lake. We took our kids for the mile walk to visit the lake and we enjoyed this (as we are the walking type), but it was not the daily fishing trip and nature play space we had envisioned. The host was kind and communicative, and the home was clean and well-kept. Thank you!
The cabin was spotless. Jamie was very responsive when I sent questions. The stairs to the bedroom were a bit steep. Great views of the lake.
Great for a cozy and relaxing getaway
Great cozy cabin with a lot of fun activities left by the hosts for us to use!
The place was very relaxing and at a great value. Jamie was very responsive. I would defiantly stay again.
We loved our time at this cabin. A perfect cozy place for a relaxing weekend!

A perfectly charming getaway for two city mice. Jamie was a super host: staying in contact & quick to respond. The location was great, both remote and quiet, yet only a quick drive to Madison or Ft Atkinson. 5-⭐️!
The cabin was even more amazing than the pictures ! Very clean, spacious, and cute. I would recommend this place to anyone and everyone!

An amazing cabin! Stunning view! The hosts were quick to respond and so helpful in finding things to do near by! Fun week getaway location! The host truly went above and beyond for us highly recommend this place!!!
Clean, cute, quiet. Lovely! Excellent host!

We ran into a snafu with the heater during our stay, and Jamie went above and beyond to make sure that we were comfortable and taken care of and that we could enjoy our time there. Thanks, Jamie and Kayla!
Beautiful place and really nice host.
The place was so cute and clean! Perfect for a weekend getaway! We had a great time!

This place was everything I needed on my recent business trip. First of all, it was extremely clean which was my biggest worry. I was greeted by two yummy chocolates on the table and a house full of clean, smelling good linens, as well as all of the appliances you could possibly need. Everything was above and beyond, from the soap, shampoo and conditioner in the shower, to the makeup remover towelettes and laundry pod to do a load of laundry before returning home. The fireplace added such a cozy feel along with the ability to listen to music on the echo dot. I truly felt like home and that is much appreciated as I get homesick! Highly recommend this cute little cabin for a family trip, couples trip, or a lonely business trip!
This is a great little place! It was perfect for me and a couple guys to stay and have an ice fishing weekend. Very clean. Great place to stay
Beautiful space and location! There are deer in the woods behind the place and you can watch beautiful sunrises from the cabin.
Everything about our stay was perfect!
Great place!
A good stay by the lake. A warm house and a comfortable bed, with all the necessities like fridge, laundry, and bath, and extras like a fireplace and a carport.

Not only is the place adorable, the hosts really went out of their way to make it feel special and homey. I’d say almost every basic necessities (like soap and even laundry detergent) was available for me. I would love to come back again and explore in the summer :)

Jamie's cabin is a great two-story cabin with a fantastic deck and view. A deer visited and was nibbling on some grass in the snow just behind the shed! The kitchen and bathrooms are clean and well stocked with basics. The area is very quiet, which is what I was looking for and perfect for working. I can imagine this being a great place in the summer with the lake so close.

This cabin was very comfortable and cozy. Check in was great...and very easy. Extremely clean and the king bed was very comfortable. It was a perfect retreat in the snow. The hosts are very responsive and had us plowed out from the overnight snowstorm quickly. Very appreciated. Thank you! We will be back!!

A nice an relaxing place to stay for a couple days in the winter. The cabin was sparkling clean. Communication before and during our stay with Jamie was excellent. We'd stay here again and recommend to others.
Nicely appointed cabin. CLEAN. Cozy & Comfy. Neat view of Lake K. Close proximity to hiking & other outdoor area fun. Reasonably priced. Would stay here again!

We thoroughly enjoyed our weekend stay at The Overlook. The space was perfect for two people. It was clean and well maintained. Jamie replied to our questions quickly and accurately. We would definitely recommend a stay at The Overlook.
The place was great! Perfect for our little getaway. Can't wait to come back in the summer to enjoy the lake.

Everything about this stay exceeded my expectations. Quick response from the hosts on any questions I had just made everything about the experience of the highest quality. Place was exactly as listed and every minor detail was taken care of by the host.
Beautiful, peaceful space in a lovely location
Thoroughly enjoyed my stay! A cozy, quaint cabin with wonderful lake views. An excellent place to unwind.
Great place to be for peace and quiet just beautiful and host are so nice and will come out to help with any of your needs !! I suggest this cabin to any and everyone

A cozy, warm home away from home. Very clean. Soft linens. Thoughtful touches like binoculars, outdoor lights, shampoo/conditioner/body wash dispenser and electric fireplace. We would definitely go back.
Just what I needed for a couple nights away from the craziness that is life in 2020. Beautiful morning view and relaxing environment if you need some peace. Highly recommend!!

I was pleasantly surprised to find that I wasn't completely alone...Alexa was there to play music any time I wanted. And the surrounding area was perfect for a long walk to clear my head.
Overall, this was the perfect place to get away. I had exactly what I needed.
Such a great cabin for hanging out with friends/family and keeping cozy playing board games at night! Right next to the beautiful lake, nice and serene, with a great deck to hang out on.
